tribalGroups.name: Gond
tribalGroups.description: One of the largest tribal groups in India, traditionally forest dwellers with rich cultural heritage

tribalGroups.name: Bhil
tribalGroups.description: Known for their warrior traditions and skilled archery, primarily inhabit hilly and forested regions

tribalGroups.name: Santhal
tribalGroups.description: Known for their distinct culture, music, and dance forms, primarily settled agriculturalists

tribalGroups.name: Munda
tribalGroups.description: Known for their traditional self-governance system and agricultural practices

tribalGroups.name: Oraon
tribalGroups.description: Also known as Kurukh, traditionally agriculturalists with strong community bonds

tribalGroups.name: Khasi
tribalGroups.description: Matrilineal society known for their unique living root bridges and agricultural practices

tribalGroups.name: Baiga
tribalGroups.primaryOccupation: Shifting cultivation and forest produce collection
tribalGroups.description: Known for their traditional bewar cultivation and deep forest knowledge

tribalGroups.name: Mising
tribalGroups.description: Riverine tribe known for their stilt houses and wet rice cultivation

tribalGroups.name: Karbi
tribalGroups.description: Hill tribe with autonomous district council, practice shifting cultivation

tribalGroups.name: Kolha
tribalGroups.description: Forest-dwelling community with traditional knowledge of medicinal plants

tribalGroups.name: Kol
tribalGroups.description: One of the oldest tribal groups, traditionally forest dwellers and cultivators

tribalGroups.name: Korku
tribalGroups.description: Known for their traditional forest-based economy and cultural practices

tribalGroups.name: Jenu Kuruba
tribalGroups.primaryOccupation: Honey collection and forest produce gathering
tribalGroups.description: Particularly Vulnerable Tribal Group known for honey collection in forests

tribalGroups.name: Betta Kuruba
tribalGroups.description: Hill-dwelling community with traditional forest rights

tribalGroups.name: Kani
tribalGroups.primaryOccupation: Forest produce collection and traditional medicine
tribalGroups.description: Known for their extensive knowledge of medicinal plants and forest ecology

tribalGroups.name: Kadar
tribalGroups.primaryOccupation: Forest produce collection and wage labor
tribalGroups.description: Particularly Vulnerable Tribal Group living in dense forest areas

tribalGroups.name: Mannan
tribalGroups.description: Forest-dwelling community with traditional agricultural practices

tribalGroups.name: Paliyan
tribalGroups.description: Particularly Vulnerable Tribal Group with nomadic traditions
